pages.text: Some materials require a much stronger heat source in order to properly form it.$(br2)A normal fire source will not be able to reach such high temperatures, so I must use a stoked flame by creating a stronger fire.$(br2)A strong fire which won't easily go out can be generated from a $(thing)hibachi$().
A controlled fire source which I can toggle on and off by redstone activation.$(br2)Its main advantage is its ability to sustain much stronger fires capable of being stoked by a $(thing)bellows$().

Now with a bellows, I can blow more oxygen into the $(thing)hibachi$() fire in order to have it grow stronger.$(br2)This process must be done continuously so I need to activate it on and off periodically.
